sentences.sContent: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.sCn: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.sContent: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.sCn: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

remMethod.val: 我们的(our)年纪(age)虽然小， 可是勇气(courage)真不少

trans.tranOther: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill
